narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Liberty Dialysis - Hawaii LLC is a Clinic/Center  End-Stage Renal Disease (ESRD) Treatment provider based in Honolulu, HI. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $42.7M in Medicaid payments across 929K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $42.7M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
